metadata.title: CVE-2015-8076 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The index_urlfetch function in index.c in Cyrus IMAP 2.3.x before 2.3.19,2.4.x before 2.4.18, 2.5.x before 2.5.4 allows remote attackers to obtainsensitive information or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectorsrelated to the urlfetch range, which triggers an out-of-bounds heap read.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd-2.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
